product_name: ASICS GEL-170 TR Running Shoes - Men's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: A great all-around shoe for training in the gym or heading out for a run, the ASICS GEL-170(TM) TR Running Shoes absorb impacts and support your feet throughout all your aerobic activities. Rearfoot GEL(R) cushioning dampens shock during impact and encourages a smooth transition to midstance. Dual-density midsoles offer good support and stability. Trusstic System(R) helps reduce the weight of the shoes without compromising the structural support. High-abrasion rubber is placed in critical areas of the outsoles for excellent traction and durability. ASICS GEL-170(TM) TR Running Shoes proudly carry the Seal of Acceptance from the American Podiatric Medical Association. Closeout.
short_description: A great all-around shoe for training in the gym or heading out for a run, the ASICS GEL-170(TM) TR Running Shoes absorb impacts and support your feet throughout all your aerobic activities.
